pullRequest.title: Move get keys section to CI/CD
pullRequest.bodyText:
Goals
Move Get-Keys section of apictl from getting started page to CI/CD section page.
Purpose
Fixes: wso2/product-apim-tooling#226
Approach

Remove Get keys section from the Getting Started page and insert them as the last step which is the step G in CI/CD pipeline.
Then change the steps in descriptions of the CI/CD pipeline section with the newly entered step.



Insert a new info section at the end of the get-keys section to provide information about changing Token type,  HTTP request timeout and export directory.


User stories
Users can follow the steps to create CI/CD pipeline with the step of Get-keys without revisiting to Getting started page.

commit.message: Move get keys section to CI/CD

nodes.bodyText: I think this is not the DefaultApplication but a new app created by CTL. Shall we do a small tweak to correct this?
